member.name: T:Relativity.CustomPages.ConnectionHelper
member.summary: Defines and establishes a database connection based on workspace ID.

member.name: M:Relativity.CustomPages.ConnectionHelper.Helper
member.summary: Returns a custom page helper object which later can be used to obtain database connection, service or authentication manager instance.

member.name: M:Relativity.CustomPages.ConnectionHelper.DBConnection(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a database connection to a desired workspace.
member.param: Integer number indicating for which workspace a connection should be created.

member.name: M:Relativity.CustomPages.ConnectionHelper.MasterDBConnection
member.summary: Returns a database connection pointing to a master database.

member.name: M:Relativity.CustomPages.ConnectionHelper.GetAuthenticationToken
member.summary: Returns a token which is later used to authenticate a currently logged in user in Relativity.
member.returns: Returns a token as a string.

member.name: T:Relativity.CustomPages.Constants
member.summary: Contains preconfigured constants which are used internally in Custom Pages.
